definition: printing portions of a page (e.g. a banner headline) in red (or other color)

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: I bought a red and a green dress.
sentences.chinese: 我買了一套紅綠色的女裝。

sentences.english: A red bandana brightens nearly any wardrobe.
sentences.chinese: 一套紅圍巾就可以讓所有的衣服亮起來。

sentences.english: She was wearing a red suit.
